title: SMC_ParameterNumber_SoE (Function)
text:
FUNCTION SMC_ParameterNumber_SoE : DINT
This function translates from a SoE (servodrive over EtherCAT)
object (IDN + element) to a SoftMotion parameter number that can be used
with function blocks like
MC_ReadParameter
,
MC_ReadBoolParameter
,
MC_WriteParameter
, and
MC_WriteBoolParameter
.

rows:
2: Name, 3: Attribute, 4: Unit, 5: Minimum, 6: Maximum, 0 or
7: Value

The data length in bytes (1, 2, or 4).
Only used when writing a parameter.
